data.text: @luckytran Biden is, as he has done throughout his career, lying. He will do nothing to combat COVID that inconveniences the rich.

@luckytran Seems like a nice speech and all but shouldn’t we wait to remove masks until after we make sure those antivirals and pcr tests are actually readily available to the public or at least those most at risk?
@luckytran "But I can promise you we’ll do everything within our power to be ready if it does." ... yeah...I very much doubt that. If that were true, so many things would be different.
@luckytran big pharma committed the holocaust and killed jfk
@luckytran His social media, alas, tells a different tale... https://t.co/opsuIv3Mjg

@luckytran I can promise him new variants will come, with ⬆️vax escape. And Long Covid.

That's completely obvious. 
And we need mask protections
Ventilation, HEPA, CO2 monitors
@luckytran That's why talk is cheap. Action matters https://t.co/3SWKakNHu7

@luckytran Sure they did, get vaccinated and stay up to date on your vaccines. You want them to hand hold adults down to pharmacy and give them a lollipop if they are good lil boys and girls if they get vaccinated?
@luckytran The CDC clearly did not get that memo.
